low.title: close-minded
description: You gain fulfilment through perseverance
You're generally pragmatic
You're perhaps data-driven
You may be perceived as dogmatic and closed-minded

high.title: open-minded
description: You're more willing to try new things
You're creative and curious of new things
You're generally more aware of your feelings
You're more likely to hold unconventional beliefs
You're more likely to be unpredictable and engage in risky behaviour

low.title: disorganised
description: You're flexible and spontaneous but can sometimes appear unreliable
You're not stubborn and are more compliant
You dislikes structure and schedules
You procrastinates important tasks

high.title: organised
description: You have a preference to plan things rather than being spontaneous
You have a tendency to display self-discipline, act dutifully, and strive for achievement against measures or outside expectations
You're more stubborn and pay attention to detail
You finish important tasks right away

low.title: introverted
description: You prefer spending time alone
You feel exhausted after socialising a lot
You dislike small talk and prefer deep conversations
You carefully think things through before speaking
You dislike being the center of attention

high.title: extroverted
description: You enjoy being the center of attention
You like to meet new people and start conversations
You find it easy to make friends
You feel energised when you're around people
You say things without thinking about them

low.title: disagreeable
description: You don't take as much interest in other people's problems
You are very competitive, even if that means cooperating less with others
You're less likely to abide to cultural norms

high.title: agreeable
description: You take a great deal of interest in other people
You're empathetic and concern for others
You enjoy assisting people when they need help

low.title: relaxed
description: You're generally emotionally stable
You deal well with stress
You are very relaxed and worry very little
You rarely feel sad or depressed

high.title: nervous
description: You tend to experience a lot of stress
You may feel anxious a lot of the time
You worry about many different things
You may have dramatic shifts in mood
